channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: New York City - Incoming Student Sendoff 2025
item.description: Date: Tuesday, August 12, 2025 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM - If you live in the NYC area, and are home on spring break, we invite you to join local alumni at the West End Labs, 125 W End Avenue, to welcome the incoming Class of 2029 and their families to RPI! Come share your RPI stories and tips with our newest students, and help make them feel welcome and connected.
item.author: Students

item.title: Meat Monday 2! | August 11
item.description: Date: Monday, August 11, 2025 11:30 AM - 2:00 PM - Join the CCPD & MANE for a sizzling end of summer! | Date: August 11, 2025 | Time: 11:30 AM – 2 PM | Location: DCC Courtyard. Enjoy delicious grilled meats alongside a variety of gluten-free, dairy-free, and vegan sides—plus a tasty meat substitute option for our plant-based friends! Come hungry and bring your friends—there’s something for everyone!
item.author: Students

item.title: Student Insurance Plan Change for 2025 - 2026
item.description: The RPI student health insurance plan has renewed for the 2025-2026 year. There are no changes to the insurance benefits and there is no increase in the health insurance fee. However, there has been a change in the insurance carrier. The new carrier is Aetna. Students are encouraged to complete enrollment on the insurance portal to activate their health insurance benefits. The deadline to waive out of the plan is September 1st.
item.author: Students

item.title: Welcome Party for the Class of 2029 | Aug. 10
item.description: Date: Sunday, August 10, 2025 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM - Join local alumni to welcome the incoming Class of 2029 and their families to RPI! The event is open to all members of the RPI community, including faculty, staff, and current students. Refreshments will be available. Come share your RPI stories and tips with our newest students, and help make them feel welcome and connected.
item.author: Community

item.title: Faculty vs Student Volleyball Game | Aug. 11
item.description: Date: Monday, August 11, 2025 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM - Serving up BBQ and volleyballs on Meat Monday! Join us on ’86 Field during Meat Monday from 12-2 PM to have a friendly rivalry volleyball match, faculty vs. students! Bragging rights are on the line.
item.author: Community

item.title: 2025-2026 Parking Permits Available August 1st
item.description: The Parking and Transportation Department is pleased to announce that the 2025-2026 parking permits are now available for purchase.
item.author: Community

item.title: Overview of Webex Webinar New Features Offered on Thursday August 14
item.description: An overview of the Webex Webinar application included in our site license will be provided, including many new features which have been recently added to the application. This training is open to all members of the Rensselaer community and will be conducted remotely via Webex. Don’t miss this opportunity to enhance your skills and make the most of the new features! View the full description and register at https://rensselaer.webex.com/weblink/register/r3ccd51d0b9dae0a77db228dc5ad5c324.
item.author: Community

item.title: Change in Faculty/Staff Meal Plan Option
item.description:
As part of our ongoing efforts to streamline services, changes in meal pricing and offering greater flexibility, we will transition fully to the Community RAD (Rensselaer Account Dollars) system at the start of the Fall 2025 Semester as the primary dining option for faculty and staff. For more information or to set up your Community RAD account, please visit the Campus Card Website, or contact the Campus Card Office at 518-276-6670 or email at campuscard@rpi.edu.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
